reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Oana is a caring, engaging physician with excellent clinical experience. I could not recommend him more highly!

He is a great doctor that we first met when I needed an urgent appointment for my daughter. At this point we liked him so much that I started taking my son to him. He is a highly knowledgeable yet very personable gentleman. In general, we very much like summit health- they seem to do an excellent job seeking out very particular doctors/individuals- I have yet to dislike any of them and I have visited a handful of different once since joining the practice some 6-7 months ago. High recommended through and through.

Dr. Oana,
Was great and be try personable. I would strong recommend him as he was thoughtful and thorough with his annual physical of my nephew.
He was my pediatrician as a child and i'm happy to bring my son to him now.  He's thorough and kind.
He genuinely cares about the health and well being of babies. He emphasized the precautionary measures we should take having a newborn in the house while our toddler son was sick.
Yes I would he prescribe the right medication and I did not have to return back to him
Dr. Oana was so caring and thorough and showed genuine interest in our daughter’s health and our own ability to cope with her situation. He’s like family to us now!

Dr. Oana is a fantastic pediatrician. I went to him as a child and I couldn't be happier having him care for my three year old. He isn't an alarmist but gives accurate and reasonable recommendations for care. My son was in the NICU when he was born and Dr. Oana has been with us every step of the way. Now he is three and a happy, healthy curious little boy. He is comforting to new parents by reassuring that you are doing a great job and that your child is healthy. I would highly recommend him!

schools.name: Univ Of Pittsburgh Sch Of Med

reviewDetails.comment: Dr Saunders in an incredible pediatrician and incredibly caring doctor. She has been able to diagnose complicated issues and has contacts with world renowned specialists. We couldn’t be in better hands
Dr Saunders is a great doctor. Both my kids have been seeing her for a few years now

Dr. Saunders has been our son's primary Pediatrician since he was born. She has always made us feel comfortable and taken the time to address both his concerns as patient and ours as parents at every step. The office is very professional and her PA is top notch in terms of her needle work completing both draws and injections as quickly and painlessly as possible.  We happily wait until appointments are available with her as opposed to taking the first available with a covering doctor, whenever circumstances allow.
